com.xebialabs.overthere.util

Class OverthereFileCopier

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xebialabs.overthere.util.OverthereFileDirectoryWalker
      • com.xebialabs.overthere.util.OverthereFileCopier

  • public final class OverthereFileCopier
extends OverthereFileDirectoryWalker
    OverthereFile copy utility that uses only the input and output streams exposed by the OverthereFile to perform the copying action.

    FIXME: Move to its proper place

      • copy

        public static void copy(OverthereFile src,
        OverthereFile dst)
        Copies a file or directory.
        Parameters:
        src - the source file or directory.
        dst - the destination file or directory. If it exists it must be of the same type as the source. Its parent directory must exist.
        Throws:
        RuntimeIOException - if an I/O error occurred
